entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. My name is Sarah. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. I'm not happy with it at all.
I understand. I'm sorry to hear that you're not satisfied. Can you please provide me with some details about the product you wish to return?
It's the VeloBand Pulse. I bought it, like, two weeks ago. It's just not working out for me.
Okay, the VeloBand Pulse. Can you provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase, please?
It's jane.doe@email.com. Look, I don't have a lot of time for this. I just want to return the darn thing. It's a smart watch, and it's just not as 'smart' as it said it would be.

Thank you. Let me pull up your order details. One moment please... Okay, I see your purchase of the VeloBand Pulse on jane.doe@email.com. Our return policy is quite generous. You have 90 days from the date of purchase to return the product for a full refund.
90 days? Really? Okay, that's... better than I thought. The website made it sound like I was going to be stuck with it. So, what do I need to do?

Yes, our standard return policy is 90 days. To initiate the return, I will email you a prepaid shipping label. Simply package the VeloBand Pulse securely, affix the label, and drop it off at your nearest shipping carrier location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process your refund.
Okay, great! That sounds easy enough. So I just need to print the label and send it back? There's no restocking fee or anything like that?

That's correct. There are no restocking fees. Just print the label, securely package the VeloBand Pulse, and send it back. We will take care of the rest. We really strive for customer satisfaction, and I apologize that the smart watch didn't meet your expectations.
Awesome! Thank you so much! I appreciate you making this so easy. I was really worried I'd be stuck with it. Is there anything else I need to do?

You're very welcome! No, that's all you need to do for now. The email with the return label will be sent to jane.doe@email.com within the next few minutes. Please let us know if you have any further questions. If any complications arise, don't hesitate to ask for a manager.
Perfect! You've been a huge help! Thank you!
You're welcome! Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit.
Thank you for calling VeloFit. Good bye.
